overview:
Ryan is responsible for making financial decisions that fulfill the Company’s long-term strategies. He works closely with other members of the executive management team to spearhead new business initiatives developing business models to ensure success. He is also responsible for scaling the Company’s IT infrastructure as well as overall financial and regulatory compliance.

Ryan is a member of the MN Society of CPAs and holds an active CPA license in Minnesota. He received a B.S. in Accounting from Northwestern College. Prior to joining W3i, Ryan worked in the audit practice at LarsonAllen where he concentrated primarily on manufacturing and commercial service clients, mergers & acquisitions and other general business roles. He has several years of experience with Grant Thornton in Minneapolis, MN where he focused on both public and privately owned companies.

relationships.title: Chief Financial Officer and Senior Vice President
